Poison spiders are monsters which can be found in many locations, including the Wilderness. There is a chance to find one when opening a chest in the Observatory Dungeon.

They have little to no drops (other than charms), aggressively attack with ranged and are fairly accurately able to poison. They can poison for up to around 300 per hit, lasting for 3 minutes. Therefore, they are generally considered nuisances, such as in the Edgeville Dungeon, while killing black demons or in battle against Chronozon during Family Crest.

Their attacks cause poison only if they inflict damage. They usually land a successful hit in the first 2 attacks if the player is not wearing good armour or has a low Defence level. The presence of these creatures generally forces players to bring anti-poison methods, wasting a slot which could have been used for other useful supplies. These monsters are not aggressive to players with a combat level of 127 or greater, except in the Wilderness and the area where Chronozon is found.

Universal drops are dropped by nearly every monster and skilling action outside of Daemonheim.
These items are dropped alongside main drops.
